headline: Do You Believe in the Growth Trajectory of Aon plc (AON)?
summary: Polen Capital, an investment management company, released its “Polen Focus Growth Strategy” first quarter 20245 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. 2025 started following the best two-year stretch ever for the Russell 1000 Growth Index, with a return of +90% largely driven by the AI infrastructure narrative. The Trump victory […]
